job_title: Shift Leader in San Diego, CA
pros: El Publo is a big full service restaraunt with a higher quality staff than other places. Its a great work experience and there is lots of opportunity for growth. Their pay is absolitely top tier!
cons: It can be overwhelming if you are transitioning from a smaller work place

job_title: Supply Chain Management in Murfreesboro, TN
cons: Lots of hours as well as bad management

pros: Cheap, delicious, fast. Convenient, friendly staff.

review_title: I enjoyed some aspects - working with the kids - but the management needs to respect staff.
job_title: Direct Care Staff in Pueblo, CO
pros: Great first job for working in human services and child care. Benefits are decent, and never had a problem with getting work compensation claims. Also, most staff are actually great and care about the kids.
cons: Management doesn't respect staff, not support by leaders. New leadership needed. Pay is horrible and hours have changed over the last few years to make it hard to manage personal/life/school schedule.

pros: The work environment is new and challenging everyday. Even though the work is hard the kids it makes a difference for is extremely rewarding and satisfying. there are not many jobs that you can really feel this good about the work you're doing.
cons: Dealing with kids who have had traumatic experiences can be traumatic for you. If you don't learn how to balance your life and stay healthy the burn out can be real.

job_title: Direct Care Staff in Pueblo, CO
pros: Making a difference in a child's life by teaching them coping skills and better ways to deal with crisis situations
cons: Clients can be assaultive on their bad days.  I just see it as a learning experience for staff and clients.

job_title: Direct Care Staff in Pueblo, CO
pros: Many hours and very good counseling training before working with youth.
cons: HR says four days on and three days off then after being hired they say you have to work five or more days in a row.

job_title: Direct Care Worker in Pueblo, CO
pros: It is rewarding to see a kiddo complete the program or just complete a goal!!!!
The kids are interesting and different

job_title: Mental Health Intern in Pueblo, CO
pros: Did internship there, liked hours worked, worked with kids
cons: lack of advancement, hard and sometimes dangerous work

review_title: There are several different reasons for working here at ElPueblo.

cons: Understaffed a lot of the time.
